Major_Arcs.title: Nan's Romantic Disillusionment and the Ghost Town Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Nan and her romantic longings, contrasts them with her reality, and then shifts to the looming threat to the Ghost Town, connecting her personal story with the broader setting and conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Lament and Skeptical Response
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Nan in a saloon, expressing her romantic disillusionment to a skeptical listener, establishing her character and initial conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Departure and Ghost Town Airport Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sees Nan abruptly leaving the saloon and introduces a new setting - the Ghost Town - along with the men discussing plans to build an airport there, setting up a new conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Ghost Town and Development Plans

sub_scenes.title: Nan and Cal's Romantic Misunderstandings
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the evolving conversation between Nan and Cal, exploring their romantic misunderstandings and deeper feelings amidst the backdrop of the Ghost Town.

Major_Arcs.title: Family Conflicts and Business Pressures
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to Nan's family dynamics, particularly her strained relationship with her father, and introduces business pressures related to cattle and the airport development, revealing underlying tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Business Interruption and Father's Scolding
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan interrupting her father's business meeting, leading to a discussion about horses and construction, and culminating in her father's harsh scolding and threat.

sub_scenes.title: Emotional Aftermath and Maternal Comfort
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the emotional fallout of the confrontation with her father, with Nan seeking solace in her room and receiving comfort and advice from her mother.

sub_scenes.title: Decision for Clarity and Father's Business Deal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Nan's decision to seek clarity from Cal and her immediate action to find him, but is interrupted by her father who directs her back to business matters.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Seek Clarity from Cal

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Conflict and Separation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the escalating conflict between Nan and Cal regarding their relationship and Nan's father's business deal, leading to their separation and Nan's subsequent loneliness.

sub_scenes.title: Ultimatum and Defiant Departure
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases a heated confrontation between Nan and Cal, where Nan gives an ultimatum and Cal defiantly chooses to follow her father's orders, leading to his departure.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Loneliness and Reflection on Cal's Absence

sub_scenes.title: Reunion and Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Cal's return after weeks and his confession to Nan, setting a more romantic tone and a potential shift in their relationship.

Major_Arcs.title: Weather Crisis and Community Response
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts the narrative to a severe weather crisis, highlighting the community's worry and the eventual hopeful intervention with aerial fodder drops, demonstrating resilience and unexpected aid.

sub_scenes.title: Weather Concerns and Historical Context
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the immediate threat of severe weather, with characters discussing dwindling supplies and the unprecedented nature of the snowfall.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Mr. Wills' and Weather Report
Historical Context of Severe Snow and Impending Starvation

sub_scenes.title: Cal's Resolve and Aerial Relief
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Cal taking decisive action to save the cattle and introduces the unexpected hope brought by a plane dropping fodder, signaling external help.

narrative_arcs.title: Cal's Resolve to Save the Cattle
Sound of a Plane and Hopeful Discovery
Fodder from the Plane and Seeds of Romance

Major_Arcs.title: Town Drama and Jeff's Hero Worship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a town setting and introduces Chane Benson and the town's reactions to his violent actions. It then focuses on Jeff's fascination with guns and his misguided hero worship, contrasting with Clyde's perspective.

sub_scenes.title: Chane Benson's Showdown and Town Gossip
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Chane Benson through a street fight and shows varied town reactions to his actions, setting him up as a controversial figure.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane Benson's Showdown and Town Reactions
Sally's Reflection on Jeff's Youth and Clyde's Commentary

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Gun Handling and Erratic Behavior
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Jeff's concerning behavior with his father's gun and his aggressive outburst, revealing his distorted perception and alarming Sally and Clyde.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Defensive Outburst and Clyde Insult
Sally and Clyde's Worries About Jeff's Behavior

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Flashback and Ominous Advice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene includes a flashback to Jeff's past troubling behavior and introduces Mr. Benson, whose advice appears dubious and potentially manipulative.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Flashback of Jeff's Troubling Past
Introduction to Mr. Benson and Ominous Advice

Major_Arcs.title: Article Controversy and Benson's Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around Clyde's controversial article about Benson, the town's reaction, and the escalating threat Benson poses to Clyde and Sally.

sub_scenes.title: Article's Fallout and Sally's Fear
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the immediate negative reactions to Clyde's article, particularly Sally's fear for Clyde's safety due to Benson's potential violent response.

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Threats and Town's Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows direct threats against Clyde and the town's varied reactions to Clyde's article, including Jeff and Er's discussion and Er's unusual plan.

sub_scenes.title: Deceptive Dinner and Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the seemingly polite dinner with Benson, which quickly unravels into accusations, threats, and Benson's assault on Sally, exposing his true nature.

Major_Arcs.title: Brotherly Conflict and Jeff's Resolve
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the escalating conflict between Jeff and Chane, revealing their sibling relationship and leading to Jeff's determined pursuit to protect Clyde from Benson.

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Revelation and Chane's Dominance
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene involves Sally revealing the sibling connection between her and Chane to Jeff, followed by Chane asserting dominance over Jeff.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane's Threat and Assertion of Dominance
Sally's Rage, Chane's Departure, and Warning about Clyde

sub_scenes.title: Jeff's Pursuit and Er's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Jeff's determined chase after Chane to save Clyde, culminating in a confrontation where Er intervenes to prevent violence.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Determined Pursuit to Save Clyde
Confrontation and Er's Plea for Restraint

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the aftermath of the fight, leading to Chane's departure, Clyde's safety, and a reflection on the power of words and family legacy.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Explanation to Sis about Clyde
Sally and Clyde's Conversation about Headline Change
Office Discussion: Newspaper Edition and Lessons Learned

Major_Arcs.title: Range War Tensions and Betsy's Firm Stance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to a new storyline focused on ranch conflicts and introduces Betsy and Steve. It explores the brewing range war, Betsy's assertive character, and her complex dynamic with Steve.

sub_scenes.title: Whip Fight and Introduction of Steve Daley
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene opens with a violent whip fight and then introduces Steve Daley, Betsy's new 'boss', setting up initial tensions and power dynamics.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Betsy's Job and Trouble

sub_scenes.title: Skepticism, Range War Warning, and Betsy's Independence
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Betsy's skepticism towards Steve, warnings about a potential range war, and Betsy asserting her independence and capability.

narrative_arcs.title: Offer of a Ride and Polite Refusal

sub_scenes.title: Town Confrontation and Betsy's Decision on Steve
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a direct confrontation in town leading to a fight, and Betsy's subsequent realization about Steve's role and her decision to keep him as a gunman.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Fred Bridges and Fight
Betsy's Realization and Decision about Steve Daley
Betsy's Change of Heart Regarding Firing Steve
Hank's Gratitude and Betsy's Suggestion for Personal Thanks

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Dilemma and Steve's Transformation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the developing romance between Betsy and Steve, centered around the conflict between Betsy's desire for a gun-free life and Steve's gunfighter identity, leading to a resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Condition and Steve's Reaction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sees Betsy setting a condition for Steve's job, requiring him to give up his guns, and Steve's initial reaction to this demand.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Conflicted Feelings about Steve's Gunslinger Identity

sub_scenes.title: Declaration of Love and Steve's Choice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Betsy's declaration of love and plea for Steve to give up his guns, leading to Steve's momentous decision to choose love over his gunfighter identity.

narrative_arcs.title: Declaration of Love and the Dilemma of Steve's Identity
Steve's Stance and Betsy's Plea for Love
Betsy's Unconditional Love and Steve's Wavering Resolve

Major_Arcs.title: Range War Escalation and Resolution
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc sees the range war tensions escalate into direct confrontation with Fred Bridges, leading to a physical fight, Betsy's firm stance, and an eventual resolution.

sub_scenes.title: Impending Trouble and Betsy's Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene foreshadows trouble and shows Betsy threatening someone for trespassing, setting up the immediate conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Past Conflict and Gunfighter Identity

sub_scenes.title: Escalating Tension and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Betsy and Hank's reactions to the escalating situation, leading to a confrontation at Devil's Pass and a subsequent resolution, although violent.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Justification and Steve's Reluctant Agreement
The Silent Journey and Cessation of Gunfire
Arrival at Devil's Pass and Accusation

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Troubles and Budding Romance (Carrie & Dave)
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new ranch setting and characters, focusing on ranch-related problems and the developing romantic relationship between Carrie and Dave amidst range conflicts.

sub_scenes.title: Argument and Range Trouble Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene starts with a personal argument and quickly transitions to the introduction of new range troubles caused by 'dudes' buying neighboring land.

sub_scenes.title: Fence Line Confrontation and Daughter's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts a confrontation at the fence line with Fred Gordon and his men, escalating into a tense standoff and resolved by the Rancher's daughter's assertive intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Apologies and Reassurance After the Confrontation

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Development and Ominous Return
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the developing romance between Carrie and Dave, interrupted by the sudden and ominous reappearance of Fred Gordon.

Major_Arcs.title: Love Triangle and Betrayal (Carrie, Dave, Fred)
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the complex love triangle between Carrie, Dave, and Fred. It involves accusations, confessions, and betrayals, leading to Carrie's ultimate rejection of Fred and a proposal from Dave.

sub_scenes.title: Accusations and Carrie's Confession
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's assertive response to Fred's accusations, leading to a deeper conversation and her confession of past feelings for Fred and current affection for Dave.

narrative_arcs.title: Dave's Support and Carrie's Confession of Love

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Proposal and Betrayal Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Dave's proposal to Carrie, interspersed with Carrie's reflections on her past feelings for Fred, and transitions into the revelation of Fred's manipulative and selfish motives.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflections on Past Misunderstandings and a Romantic Proposal
Fred's Strategic Proposition and Carrie's Initial Reaction
The Unveiling of Fred's Selfish Motives and Carrie's Betrayal

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Rejection and Determined Retaliation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases Carrie's angry confrontation and rejection of Fred, followed by her resolve to retaliate against his manipulation and seek justice.

narrative_arcs.title: Carrie's Angry Confrontation and Rejection of Fred
The Confrontation with Fred and Dave's Unexpected Arrival

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Carlton and Carrie's Victory
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's direct confrontation with Mr. Carlton, leading to her triumph and Fred's defeat in their business dealings.

Major_Arcs.title: Post-Conflict Reflections and Realizations (Carrie & Dave)
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc deals with the aftermath of the conflict with Fred and Mr. Carlton, exploring Carrie and Dave's relationship dynamics, unspoken feelings, and eventual reconciliation, albeit with emotional complexities.

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Firm Stance and Chance Encounter
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Carrie asserting her independence and rejecting Fred, followed by a chance encounter with Dave in town, setting up their subsequent conversation.

sub_scenes.title: Carrie's Ailment and Dave's Persuasion
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Carrie's emotional distress manifesting as illness, Dave's visit and persistent persuasion about Fred, culminating in a kiss between Dave and Carrie.

narrative_arcs.title: Carlton's Account of Fred's Visit and Carrie's Rejection
Dave's Interrogation and Carrie's Love Confession
Dave's Pragmatic Advice and Carrie's Emotional Turmoil
Dave's Persuasion and Carrie's Plea for Affection

Major_Arcs.title: Marshal Dirk Storyline and Romantic Resolution (Rance & Chris)
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new storyline focusing on Marshal Dirk and Rance, exploring their complex relationship amidst danger and duty, culminating in a romantic resolution for Rance and Chris.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Injury and Pursuit Realization
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins with Dirk's cryptic arrival and revelation of being injured, followed by the realization that they are being pursued, setting up immediate danger.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Questioning at the Ranch

sub_scenes.title: Moral Dilemma and Temporary Truce
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the confrontation with Rance Cready, the moral dilemma of dealing with the injured Dirk, and a temporary truce established for Dirk's recovery.

narrative_arcs.title: Shift in Stance and Temporary Truce
Evolving Relationship - Night Encounter and Recognition

sub_scenes.title: Confession, Separation, and Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene features Chris and Rance's romantic confession, followed by the practicalities of Dirk's escape, their separation, and subsequent pursuit.

narrative_arcs.title: Retrospective on Evasion Attempts and the Marshal's Ambush

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Farewell, and Reunion in Mexico
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dirk and Rance's escape, their farewells, and eventual reunion in Mexico, resolving their immediate danger and showcasing their complicated relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Leave the Marshal and Reflection

sub_scenes.title: Rance's Recovery and Romantic Climax (Rance & Chris)
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts back to Rance's recovery, focusing on the emotional reunion with Chris, their mutual confessions, and culminating in a marriage proposal, providing a romantic resolution.

narrative_arcs.title: Confession of Love and Proposal Tease

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Day and Dirk's Unexpected Arrival
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the bride's pre-wedding reflections, the start of the wedding ceremony, and Dirk's dramatic interruption, bringing back past tensions to the wedding day.

narrative_arcs.title: Walking Down the Aisle and Dirk's Arrival
Marshal's Wedding Gift and Dirk's Fate
Final Remarks on Dirk and Rance's Taste
